title: Broadchurch series three will film in Summer 2016, Olivia Colman confirms - Broadchurch TV
text: Broadchurch star Olivia Colman has confirmed that the ITV drama will begin filming its third series in Summer 2016.The actress raised anticipation ahead of the hugely popular drama's return by announcing the news on BBC Radio 4 yesterday (October 18). © Rex Features / David Fisher Speaking on Loose Ends with Clive Anderson, Coleman said: "We start filming next Summer. I have no idea what the story will be yet."Colman's co-star David Tennant also flagged the news on Twitter, writing: "Olivia Colman confirms ‪#Broadchurch Series Three starts filming Summer 2016."Olivia Colman confirms #Broadchurch Series Three starts filming Summer 2016http://t.co/UIf2EHFf8m (at 5 mins) pic.twitter.com/dS6MJTByMA— David Tennant (@David_Tennant) October 18, 2015Jodie Whittaker reflects on Broadchurch 2: "I couldn't tell family or friends what I was filming"Broadchurch has proved a major success for ITV, and was named amongst the big winners at the TVChoice Awards earlier this year.Watch the trailer for Broadchurch series two below:
